testCase.name: Board coordinates Coordinate H8 is on the lower left corner from the black's perspective
Board coordinates Coordinate A1 is on the top right corner from the black's perspective
Board coordinates Coordinate H8 and H7 is on the lower left corner from the black's perspective
Determining whether a king is in check Pawn before king in same H column is not check
Determining whether a king is in check Pawn diagonally before king in adjacent column is in check
Determining whether a king is in check Pawn before king in same G column is not in check
